name: Squat
description: A lower body exercise where you bend your knees and lower your body
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower your body by bending your knees until your thighs are parallel to the ground. Push back up to the starting position.

name: Push-up
description: An upper body exercise using your own body weight
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart. Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground. Push back up to the starting position.

name: Lunge
description: A lower body exercise that targets one leg at a time
instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your body until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle. Push back to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.

name: Plank
description: A core strengthening exercise where you hold a static position
instructions: Start in a plank position with forearms on the ground. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels. Hold this position for as long as possible.

name: Burpee
description: A full-body exercise combining a squat, push-up, and jump
instructions: Start standing. Drop into a squat position and place your hands on the ground. Jump or step your feet back into a plank position. Do a push-up. Jump your feet back to the squat position. Jump up with your hands overhead.

name: Jumping Jack
description: A cardio exercise where you jump while spreading your legs and raising your arms
instructions: Stand with feet together and arms at your sides. Jump while spreading your feet shoulder-width apart and raising your arms above your head. Jump back to the starting position with feet together and arms at your sides.
